direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve data related to mining but for different entities (algorithms vs. coin names).
Both methods involve parameter checking and sending signed requests with similar structures.
Both methods can be tested using similar setups and assertions due to their similar request handling mechanisms.
Both methods access mining-related data and handle similar parameters.
